Package com.dimitris.cryptoanalyze.service.impl

Class CryptoAnalyzerImpl

java.lang.Object
com.dimitris.cryptoanalyze.service.impl.CryptoAnalyzerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CryptoAnalyzer
@Service public class CryptoAnalyzerImpl extends Object implements CryptoAnalyzer
Service for calling calculations according to endpoint requests and mapping results to endpoint responses

  • Method Details

    • getCryptosSortedByNormalizedRangeDesc

      public CryptoMetricsListDto getCryptosSortedByNormalizedRangeDesc(Optional<TimePeriodRequestDto> timePeriodRequestDto) throws CryptoInternalException
      Calculates cryptos list sorted by normalized range in descending order
      Specified by:
      getCryptosSortedByNormalizedRangeDesc in interface CryptoAnalyzer
      Parameters:
      timePeriodRequestDto - Optional time period calculation applies to. If omitted, calculation has no time restriction. It contains two optional fields representing start and end time points. If any of them is omitted, calculation will be restricted only to the other point in time. If both are omitted, calculation has no time restriction.
      Returns:
      A list of mappings between crypto and its normalized range value (no mappings exist for cryptos for which no values are found)
      Throws:
      CryptoInternalException - Internal error during crypto data loading, manipulations or calculations

    • getMetricsForCrypto

      public CryptoMetricsDto getMetricsForCrypto(Optional<TimePeriodRequestDto> timePeriodRequestDto, String crypto) throws CryptoInternalException, CryptoNotFoundException
      Calculates metrics for specified crypto
      Specified by:
      getMetricsForCrypto in interface CryptoAnalyzer
      Parameters:
      timePeriodRequestDto - Optional time period calculation applies to. If omitted, calculation has no time restriction. It contains two optional fields representing start and end time points. If any of them is omitted, calculation will be restricted only to the other point in time. If both are omitted, calculation has no time restriction.
      crypto - The crypto
      Returns:
      A mapping of each metric to corresponding value (empty map if no values found for crypto)
      Throws:
      CryptoInternalException - Internal error during crypto data loading, manipulations or calculations
      CryptoNotFoundException - Requested crypto is not supported

    • getCryptoWithHighestNormalizedRange

      public CryptoMetricDto getCryptoWithHighestNormalizedRange(Optional<TimePeriodRequestDto> timePeriodRequestDto) throws CryptoInternalException
      Finds crypto with highest normalized range
      Specified by:
      getCryptoWithHighestNormalizedRange in interface CryptoAnalyzer
      Parameters:
      timePeriodRequestDto - Optional time period calculation applies to. If omitted, calculation has no time restriction. It contains two optional fields representing start and end time points. If any of them is omitted, calculation will be restricted only to the other point in time. If both are omitted, calculation has no time restriction.
      Returns:
      A mapping of the crypto to its normalized range value (if no crypto data found, mapping contains null as values)
      Throws:
      CryptoInternalException - Internal error during crypto data loading, manipulations or calculations
